title: Clipboard Data
descrption: Adversaries may collect data stored in the Windows clipboard from users copying information within or between applications. WindowsApplications can access clipboard data by using the Windows API. [1] MacOSX provides a native command, pbpaste, to grab clipboard contents  [2].

related.Name: Agent Tesla
related.Description: Agent Tesla can steal data from the victim’s clipboard.[9][10][11]

related.Name: APT38
related.Description: APT38 used a Trojan called KEYLIME to collect data from the clipboard.[26]

related.Name: Astaroth
related.Description: Astaroth collects information from the clipboard by using the OpenClipboard() and GetClipboardData() libraries.[21]

related.Name: Catchamas
related.Description: Catchamas steals data stored in the clipboard.[6]

related.Name: CosmicDuke
related.Description: CosmicDuke copies and exfiltrates the clipboard contents every 30 seconds.[15]

related.Name: DarkComet
related.Description: DarkComet can steal data from the clipboard.[19]

related.Name: Empire
related.Description: Empire can harvest clipboard data on both Windows and macOS systems.[5]

related.Name: Helminth
related.Description: The executable version of Helminth has a module to log clipboard contents.[13]

related.Name: JHUHUGIT
related.Description: A JHUHUGIT variant accesses a screenshot saved in the clipboard and converts it to a JPG image.[7]

related.Name: jRAT
related.Description: jRAT can capture clipboard data.[23]

related.Name: Koadic
related.Description: Koadic can retrieve the current content of the user clipboard.[3]

related.Name: KONNI
related.Description: KONNI had a feature to steal data from the clipboard.[20]

related.Name: Machete
related.Description: Machete hijacks the clipboard data by creating an overlapped window that listens to keyboard events. [24][25]

related.Name: MacSpy
related.Description: MacSpy can steal clipboard contents.[12]

related.Name: Remcos
related.Description: Remcos steals and modifies data from the clipboard.[4]

related.Name: Remexi
related.Description: Remexi collects text from the clipboard.[22]

related.Name: RTM
related.Description: RTM collects data from the clipboard.[8]

related.Name: RunningRAT
related.Description: RunningRAT contains code to open and copy data from the clipboard.[14]

related.Name: TinyZBot
related.Description: TinyZBot contains functionality to collect information from the clipboard.[17]

related.Name: VERMIN
related.Description: VERMIN collects data stored in the clipboard.[18]

related.Name: Zeus Panda
related.Description: Zeus Panda can hook GetClipboardData function to watch for clipboard pastes to collect.[16]
